CustomField.description: Related Contact record if one exists. Use contactNameOrEmail parameter to resolve by name or email. System should use best judgement to match by phone/email when creating records. This is optional - candidates can exist without a Contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link this program candidate to a Contact record if one exists. This is optional - candidates can exist without a Contact. The system will attempt to match by phone/email when creating records.
CustomField.label: Contact
